body_html:
Is it intentional that the current recommended link on pytorch.org for the CUDA = None version actually points to the same URL as CUDA = 7.5? Might be related.. especially when compiling from source helps.
http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu75/torch-0.2.0.post1-cp35-cp35m-manylinux1_x86_64.whl

body:
Is it intentional that the current recommended link on pytorch.org for the `CUDA = None` version actually points to the same URL as `CUDA = 7.5`? Might be related.. especially when compiling from source helps.
http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu75/torch-0.2.0.post1-cp35-cp35m-manylinux1_x86_64.whl
